overview: Soft, subtle, smooth, soothing, sensual -- LEATHER. It snuggles, it hugs, it holds and shapes the body perfectly in detail! The alluring smell of man and leather -- LEATHER SENSATIONS captures the eroticism and the empowerment allure of leather and its many uses. Hot, rock hard bodies adorned and outfitted with the leather they love. A sensual fantasy trip that heightens the sexual tension and romp towards white hot release!
title: Leather Sensations
